item.title: How to run a Kotlin script
item.description: I was recently helping Tim get a Pinot data-loading Kotlin script working and it took me a while to figure out the best way to run it. In this blog post, I’ll share the solution we came up with. But first things first, we need to install Kotlin if it’s not already installed. I used a library called SDKMAN6 for all things JVM, so I’m gonna run the following command:
